name: DailyDigitalGods
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: Let the Digital Gods bless you, or curse you! From high in the cloud, they will generate countless curses to hurl your way, and then bless you for asking! This skill generates numerous random blessings or curses based upon your request. Fun for the whole family.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
